name: initialLayoutAttributesForAppearingSupplementaryElement(ofKind:at:)
desc: Returns the starting layout information for a supplementary view being added to the collection view.
declaration:
func initialLayoutAttributesForAppearingSupplementaryElement(ofKind elementKind: NSCollectionView.SupplementaryElementKind, 
                                                          at elementIndexPath: IndexPath) -> NSCollectionViewLayoutAttributes?
